sentences.en: Do not drive with the handbrake on.
Don't drive with the handbrake on.
He stopped just as his truck tilted down the steep incline, put on the handbrake, and stepped out.
sentences.cn: 就在他的卡车沿陡峭的斜坡向下滑的时候，他停了下来，拉住了手闸，然后下了车。

sentences.en: Only use the handbrake when your vehicle is stationary.
sentences.cn: 只有在停车时才动用手刹.

sentences.en: Release the clutch, handbrake, eg of a lorry.
sentences.cn: 松开离合器 、 手闸(如卡车上的).

sentences.en: The brakes may also be operated by mechanical linkages from the foot pedal and handbrake lever.
sentences.cn: 制动器也可由与制动踏板和手制动器杆相连的机械联动装置操纵.

sentences.en: The car argue whether the footbrake or the handbrake should be applied.
sentences.cn: 车主们还在争论着应该用脚刹车还是用手刹车.

sentences.en: The car, whose handbrake wasn't very reliable , began to slide backwards.
sentences.cn: 这辆车已开始向后滑动, 因为手闸不太灵.

sentences.en: The joint owners of the car argued whether the footbrake or the handbrake should be applied.
sentences.cn: 合资的车主们还在争论着应该用脚刹车还是用手刹车.

sentences.en: They forgot to apply the handbrake and the car rolled 60ft into the river.
sentences.cn: 他们忘了拉手刹，汽车翻滚了60英尺，掉进了河里。

sentences.en: When the brake pedal is depressed, the handbrake works.
sentences.cn: 踏下制动踏板, 驻车制动器作用.

trans.tran_en: a brake in a car that you pull up with your hand to stop the car from moving when it is parked
